about_the_game:
"Cardinal" sets you loose in a virtual playground where new and exciting challenges wait around every turn. Progress through six unique worlds and collect mysterious cartridges by completing dozens of unique minigames and challenges. Leave no stone unturned as you discover new trials, compelling characters, and hidden secrets.

Game Features

  • Explore Six Unique Worlds: A mysterious forest, a vast desert formed from an ancient ocean, an archipelago of floating islands in the sky, and more.

  • Dozens of Cartridges to Collect: Complete dozens of retro-inspired minigames and test your skills across platforming challenges, boss battles, and puzzles.

  • Meet a Colorful Cast of Characters: Interact with villagers, warriors, monsters, and scoundrels to learn more about the vast world around you.

  • Immerse Yourself in a Beautiful Blend of Pixel Art Styles: Stunning pixelated 3D worlds and classic arcade-inspired minigames offer a distinctive look and feel.

  • Listen to an Engaging Score: Add to your immersion as you lose yourself in dozens of musical tracks crafted to compliment each new setting.

Progress through six unique worlds and collect mysterious cartridges by completing dozens of unique minigames and challenges. mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS Ventura or later
  • Processor: M1 or Intel equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: M1 or Intel equivalent
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS Ventura or later
  • Processor: M1 or Intel equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: M1 or Intel equivalent
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Cardinal

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-9600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX970
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-9600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX970
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Complete dozens of unique minigames and challenges to collect mysterious cartridges across six distinct worlds. Leave no stone unturned as you encounter new trials, compelling characters, and hidden secrets.
